author: IBM Technology
description:
Ready to become a certified watsonx AI Assistant Engineer? Register now and use code IBMTechYT20 for 20% off of your exam → https://ibm.biz/BdbvCq

Learn more about Model Context Protocol (MCP) here → https://ibm.biz/BdbvCf

How do AI agents learn and take action? 🤖 Live from TechXchange in Orlando, Melissa Hadley breaks down how MCP and RAG help large language models connect to data — one to retrieve knowledge, the other to execute tasks. Explore how these frameworks combine to power smarter, connected AI systems.

AI news moves fast. Sign up for a monthly newsletter for AI updates from IBM → https://ibm.biz/BdbeYj

#aiagents #modelcontextprotocol #retrievalaugmentedgeneration #llm
title: MCP vs. RAG: How AI Agents & LLMs Connect to Data
